entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
